name: Morrison Murders
description:
Morrison MurdersHorror Game

Welcome to Horror Finds latest game, Morrison Murders. This game is a mouse move, and click game. Invloves a series of puzzles, and will give you the simulation of looking at difference scenes as to what actually happened at this house.

Goals of the game:
  • Find the letters, and make sense as to what happed all those years ago.
  • Find your way out, without having to start over.
  • Find all the keys needed to get all the peices together.
  • Sucussfully solving all of the puzzles in the game.
Instructions
  • Play the game with the sound ON
  • To get into the house simply click on the door.
  • Make sure to read all the news articles.
  • Find all the pieces of paper in kitchen to reveal a secret.
Good Luck Gamers!

#Horror Finds
